tool_description: API made from the most popular leagues in the world and from all the leagues in Argentina
name: ifutbol
title: ifutbol

api_list.name: La Liga
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ifutbol.p.rapidapi.com/leagues/laliga"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ifutbol.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
